meta_description: Explore the rich history, culture and art of the Chilkat Valley at the nationally accredited Haines Sheldon Museum! Located in Haines, Alaska, the Haines Sheldon Museum showcases the art and culture of Haines, Alaska.
hours_text:
# Visit

### Address

11 Main Street

PO Box 269  
Haines, AK 99827

Call: (907) 766-2366

### 

### Admission

Adults: $10  
Children 12 & Under: FREE  
NARM* Members: FREE  
Haines Residents: FREE  
Active Military: FREE

*The Haines Sheldon Museum is a member of the [North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM) program](https://narmassociation.org/join/individual-membership/). Remember to bring your membership card for your home institution to receive admission benefits!

### Summer Hours

**7 Days A Week 10 am – 5 pm.**

To arrange a tour, call 907-766-2366.__

_Hours are flexible for pre-arranged tours._

##### **Research Hours**

By appointment, call 907-766-2366.

Please schedule research appointments in advance.

### 

[](https://www.sheldonmuseum.org/wp-content/uploads/info_haines_map_full.jpg)

### Location

Centrally downtown on the original Haines Mission grounds in a picture-perfect setting overlooking Lynn Canal, a magnificent fjord. Our staff and volunteers warmly greet all visitors and happily share stories about life in the Chilkat Valley. Guided tours are available upon request.

Click on the map at left for a larger view or [CLICK HERE for the Google map](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Haines+Sheldon+Museum/@59.2345719,-135.4456367,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x54001f7635b17e21:0x604bfb9cf739ac59!8m2!3d59.2345692!4d-135.443448?hl=en).

# Visit

### Address

11 Main Street

PO Box 269  
Haines, AK 99827

Call: (907) 766-2366

### 

### Admission

Adults: $10  ...
